# Welcome to my website!

I am Jing Wang, a lab manager at Case Western Reserve University. My professional journey has been driven by a passion for addressing scientific questions that contribute to improved healthcare outcomes. The focus of my current project is to identify blood biomarkers for stroke.

Please feel free to [contact me](mailto:jxw445@case.edu) if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.
